comment: Kinda quirky but her test are short and pretty easy!

Calculus was so much more fun with professor Fuller! Obviously this class is going to be difficult, so you have to put in lots of effort. Thankfully she has office hours and is very open to questions.
Sweetest woman ever. If you ever get stuck, she's ready to help during her office hours. There is honestly not a bad thing to say about her. Just show up to her class and it's an A.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Gives good feedback--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: The best math teacher I have ever had. I got a C in the class only because I was taking 17 hours and was very overwhelmed, but she did everything she could to help me. She was extremely patient and kind, very thorough, and more than happy to sit with you and explain as many times as you need. I appreciated her so much! Hard hard curriculum though!

I wouldn't recommend anyone else. I loved her so much! Not only is she the sweetest ever, her lectures are perfect. The lectures are based on question styles that will be on the test (no surprises no curveballs on test day). She also gives study guides for each test, so you know exactly what question types to focus on. TAKE HER!!!

She's one of the best professors at KSU! If you're really good at math, you'll love her. Personally, I found the class a bit difficult as it was my first time taking Calc 1. Also, her exams may not be the easiest for someone who's not taking this class immediately after precalc. Downside is that the class uses Achieve for hw.
Great professor, I would definitely recommend. Took her for Calc 1 and she wants all her students to succeed. Attend lectures and you'll be fine.

She is a wonderful professor that actually cares. First week she takes her time to learn your name that way it is easier to recognize you throughout the semester. I would absolutely take her again... but on that note Achieve is an atrocious application for homework and that is what you use in this course. I could've done much better without achieve
She is a kind teacher who takes her time teaching. Take her but u will still have to work for a good grade but she is an amazing teacher.

I will say that she is a great teacher, but if you're someone was isn't already strong in math, i would take someone else. She moves very quickly and doesn't curve or let you do corrections on tests. Her tests are very hard.

Prof Fuller is an amazing professor! She is always very enthusiastic about learning & shows deep care for her students. Attendance is required as notes aren't posted online (unless you send her an email about absence) & there are in class activities. Very lenient with grades as several lowest grades are dropped. Lots of HW, but super helpful!

Prof. Fuller was great!! She gives really good feedback and has such a good way of explaining problems. You can tell how enthusiastic she is about math in her lectures. There is a fair amount of homework, maybe 5-8 hours a week, but it really prepares you for the tests (which are in person and you can sometimes use one side of a flashcard).

Her lectures are great. Calc is a difficult topic for many people but I think if you can pay attention to her lectures you will do great in her class. She is also very accessible in and out of class and also offers some extra credit and drops some grades toward the end of the semester.
She was so sweet and was always helped you if you needed it. Not a ton of homework. Clear tests exactly like class. Great lectures!
She's a caring professor and is good at teaching. She's available outside of class.

Professor Fuller is so amazing that I built my spring schedule around making sure I am in her next semester's math class, and I know several other classmates did the same thing. She has such an amazing attitude. She cares about her students and goes around to each individual to make sure they get it. Homework can be a little much, but she is great!
Best math professor at ksu. Really cares about you learning the material.

She is so good guys! Like I have always been ok at math but in this course I can truly say while it is just algebra I have never felt more confident in a class like hers. She is super cool and approachable so don't be scared to ask questions if you are lost in the content. Homework can be a lot sometimes tho but other than that she is truly great.

Professor Fuller is an amazing professor in almost every way. Well designed quizzes and tests, very interesting and helpful lectures, and a caring attitude towards math. She uses extremely helpful analogies and tidbit tips. If you struggle with math in general, I highly recommend Professor Fuller. Best decision I made this semester, by far.

Without saying anything new Professor Fuller is an absolutely incredible teacher. She is inspirational in that no matter what is going on, she always has a genuine smile on her face and will make your day brighter. One of the kindest - if not the - kindest teachers I have ever met. She wants you to succeed and will give you credit for hard work

Prof. Fuller is the best Math Professor that you could possibly take at KSU. She is extremely kind and lovely to her students. She always has positive energy and a smile on her face. This makes math a lot more enjoyable especially the subject isn't one of your strengths. She gives 5 bonus points on each exam for completing a unit road map as well.

Professor Fuller is the best math teacher I have ever had. I love math but she made me love it more! she gives so may different tools to use to learn the material (study guides, aleks, office hrs). She is so sweet outside of class too! Please take her! She will do anything in her power to make you learn! go to class & try & she will do the rest.

Mrs. Fuller is a GREAT professor. She is so caring and thoughtful. She provides notecards for us to take notes on to use for our tests, she checks up on us when she knows we've been sick, and she walks around and talks to each one of us to make sure everyone individually understands the content. She CARES and that's what I love about her. Take her!
She is one of the best professors I have ever had. She is going through notes really carefully and guide us if we needed it. I totally recommend this teacher.

Prof. Fuller is a fantastic professor. It's apparent that she actually cares about her students and wants them to do well. IF YOU ARE READING THIS, DO YOURSELF A FAVOR AND SIGN UP FOR HER CLASS BEFORE ITS TOO LATE

She is really nice and would try to help you. But if you're not good at math she won't be able to help you as much. She does try to make you pass her class but doesn't give extra credit. And uses Alex a lot for her teaching. It really depends how you study and how good you are in math. If you're taking a bunch of classes wouldn't recommend her.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Test heavy--Graded by few things

comment: Dr. Fuller was engaging and her teaching style aligned very well with my learning style, to the point that i got an A+ in her math class when I haven't been able to get above a B in years. There is a good bit of online homework but if you set aside the time and do a few problems a day you should be able to get it all done

Mrs. Fuller does an amazing job explaining the concepts in class, she goes through each problem step by step and clearly explains everything. She is very kind and caring to her students. She does a very good job at helping individual students get a better understanding of how to solve and understand the concepts. I 100% recommend her class.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Beware of pop quizzes--Accessible outside class

comment: Absolutely loved having Professor Susan, she is so caring and wants her students to pass. She makes class fun and engaging and wants you to reach out to her with questions. Beware of pop quizzes, but she gives credit where it is due. I'm taking her for Pre-Calc right now and she is absolutely the best!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Lecture heavy--Accessible outside class

comment: If you want to not only master precalculus but also enjoy doing it, TAKE PROFESSOR FULLER! She is absolutely amazing, and her class is structured so well. She doesn't rush and is there to help! The homework is plentiful, but it is extremely helpful with understanding the content and being prepared for exams. Favorite math teacher EVER!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: So easy and such a great professor. Definitely take if you have the chance.

She is a fantastic professor. She truly cares about all her students and wants everyone to get an A in her class. She makes some challenging concepts that may be hard to understand easy at the end of the lecture. Also, if you don't understand anything and need help, ask her! Overall Amazing professor and I highly recommend her.

The best math teacher I have had. Made the class so easy and took time to explain if you di dnot understand. Had aleks hoemwork every week and a study guide before every test. Gave some extra credit but it was not needed. If you go to class you will not fail, she will not let you. Best option for a math professor.
Would definitely recommend taking her class. She is a great teacher. There is homework assignments every week but those are very easy. Test and weekly quizzes are not difficult.
I went from failing pre calc in HS to getting a high B. She is an amazing teacher and explains things very well and actually makes math enjoyable. I HIGHLY recommend taking her.
She is a good teacher and cares about her students.

She is so sweet and has such a fun personality. She makes math understandable and actually tolerable! She is also so caring and so easy to talk to if you need help! She really makes you actually want to learn about math! I would definitely recommend her!
Awesome professor who cares
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Beware of pop quizzes--Accessible outside class

comment: Professor Fuller is amazing! There is weekly homework on Aleks that will help you fully understand the material and it is not hard. She cares about her students and takes a lot of time to fully explain the material. If you are someone who needs extra help in math I could not recommend her more!

Believe me when I say I am terrible at math, but Professor Fuller taught precalc in a way that I actually enjoyed it, even when I struggled. She is SO SWEET and truly wants her students to do well and learn the material. I wish I could take her for all my math classes. Take her!!!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Beware of pop quizzes--Caring

comment: amazing lectures

Professor Fuller was an amazing math teacher, she breaks down the material enough for you to understand. She will make sure you understand before moving on to the next topic. She grades based on work shown rather than just the correct  answer. I wish she was teaching CALC because I would definitely take her class again.

Take her class! Lectures are engaging and very straightforward. She doesnt require attendance grade-wise, but still need to go to class. Its okay if you have to miss it, shes very understanding. Homework is a lot of ALKES every week, a website to do math online, but its easy to manage and self-explanatory. Quizzes every week but are super easy.

Professor Fuller is the best math teacher I've ever had. She does an excellent job in explaining concepts in class, and always offers additional help outside of class. If you put in any amount of effort, you will pass. There are weekly quizzes; however, she always gives partial credit for any attempts. She also permits a index card for each test.
Weekly pop quizzes, the test are sometimes easy and sometimes hard. Weekly Aleks=easy. She is a great teacher and truly cares about the students and her work.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Beware of pop quizzes--Accessible outside class

comment: I LOVE HER! She makes math SO easy! She really takes her time to show you step by step what to do. I was extremely lucky to get this professor. She does do weekly pop quizzes along with Aleks for homework but they are so so easy!! Show up to class and youll do great. TAKE HER CLASS IF YOU ARENT GOOD AT MATH!!! THANK ME LATER !!!
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Gives good feedback--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: Professor Fuller is extremely nice/caring & is even more so understanding. She is VERY lenient with late work/missing assignments & gives you a couple of freebies, but dont take advantage of that. ALEKS each week(so dont procrastinate), & gives partial credit for tests/pop quizzes. She really helps you grasp the material with her teaching style.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Beware of pop quizzes--Caring
